Instructions:
The goal of the game is to train your abbility to assess and compare sums.
You are in a supermarket and start with a budget of 50â‚¬ (?).
To survive, always choose the shopping cart with the lowest price.
If you choose a shopping cart that is above your budget, you lose one of your lives and can start the level again.
If you have money left after passing the last wave of shopping carts, this will be added to your budget in the next level.
If you collect more shopping carts than waves you can choose from several bonuses to use in the next level.
 Good luck with your shopping tour!

Instructions:
Train your Math Skills!
